Game Title

Default Controls:

    • Movement:
    • Up:

      W

    • Down:

      S

    • Left:

      A

    • Right:

      D

    • Abilities:
    • Bomb: Space Bar

      Destroys everything on screen except bosses

    • Shoot: Automatic

      Just point the mouse in the direction in which you want to shoot

    • Slow Down: N

      Slow down your own movement
